title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not appearing in subsequent sessions. These files should be persisted between sessions. It is noted that the implementation should be using the IPersistableElement and should not rely on the underlying resource of the IEditorInput.
OB: The MRU file list in the File menu is not visible during subsequent sessions.
EB: The MRU file list in the File menu should be visible and accurate between sessions.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the application.
4. Re-launch the application.
5. Check the File menu to see if the MRU file list is populated with the previously opened files.
